DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample blood tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This research study study biomarkers blood tumor tissue sample patient Wilms tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers Blood Tumor Tissue Samples From Patients With Wilms Tumor
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To determine whether Wilms Tumor ( WT ) patient without WT1-associated congenital anomaly syndrome , end-stage renal disease ( ESRD ) unrelated progressive bilateral tumor , carry germline WT1 mutation . - To determine whether non-syndromic WT1 germline mutation carrier substantially high incidence ESRD WT patient harbor WT1 mutation . OUTLINE : Archived blood tumor tissue specimen ( DNA isolate sample ) analyze WT1 mutation gene sequence PCR .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis Wilms Tumor ( WT ) Patients participate NWTS5 protocol Nonsyndromic patient develop endstage renal disease ( ESRD ) 510 year reason progressive bilateral WT Matched control patient develop ESRD time ( since WT onset ) ESRD diagnosis Blood tumor tissue sample available PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
